short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension verifies the ownership of smart contracts on Etherscan and the websites associated with the contracts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ztamp Contract Verifier verifies the ownership of smart contracts and also the websites associated with the smart contract. The purpose of this extension is to help prevent scams by ascertaining who owns a particular smart contract. It works with Etherscan so that when you view a contract on Etherscan.io, you will see a checkmark if the contract ownership is verified. Otherwise, you will either see a question mark (?) if the owner is unknown, or an X mark if the contract ownership has been revoked.
